thread.section_title: Life Style Sports Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Life Style Sports | lifestylesports.com
thread.title: Tracy O'Connor
thread.title_full: Life Style Sports reviewed by Tracy O'Connor

author: Tracy O'Connor
title: Tracy O'Connor
text: I was looking to change a kids jersey where the receipt was out of date. The shop assistant refunded the amount on to a gift card for me and then purchased the correct size online for me. The package arrived in my local store the next day. It was an excellent shopping experience all round.
